name: GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status
desc: The state the participant is in during the match.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The participant is in an unexpected state.

items.name: case invited
items.desc: The participant is invited to the match, but hasnâ€™t responded to the invitation.

items.name: case declined
items.desc: The participant declines the invitation to join the match, automatically terminating the match.

items.name: case matching
items.desc: The participant represents an unfilled position in the match that Game Center promises to fill when needed.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The participant joins the match and is an active player.
